summary: Implements a BERT‑based sequence tagging model that transforms spoken‑domain token sequences into their written‑domain equivalents by assigning tags such as KEEP, DELETE, or class‑specific replacement labels, following the LaserTagger approach for inverse text normalization.
business_intent: Enhance speech‑to‑text pipelines by providing accurate post‑processing of recognized tokens, enabling voice assistants and other speech applications to output correctly formatted written text.
